com.topcoder.search.builder
Class ConnectionStrategy

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.ConnectionStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
DatabaseConnectionStrategy, LDAPConnectionStrategy
Deprecated. This public class is not used any more

public abstract class ConnectionStrategy
extends java.lang.Object

It holds the Connection object used to conduct search,all the search are do at the according classes to this abstract class.

Version:
1.3
Author:
ShindouHikaru, TCSDEVELOPER

Field Summary
protected  ConnectionInformation connectionInfo
          Deprecated. It holds the ConnectionInformation object used to create a connection to the data store.
 
Constructor Summary
protected ConnectionStrategy(ConnectionInformation connectionInfo)
          Deprecated. Create a new instance for providing the ConnectionInformation,which contain the connection factory.

          Deprecated. Close the connection.

Method Detail

search

public java.lang.Object search(java.lang.String searchString)
                        throws PersistenceOperationException
Deprecated. 

Search data store and return search result,including the connection creation and searchDataStore The different class extends this abstract class may access the different datasource, database or LDAP server.

Parameters:
searchString - a search string used to conduct the search. For example. for database, it is a sql, for LDAP it is a filter string
Returns:
Object holding search result
Throws:
PersistenceOperationException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is Null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is any paramter is empty
PersistenceOperationException - if any error when operating over data store

search

public abstract java.lang.Object search(java.lang.String searchString,
                                        java.util.List fields)
                                 throws PersistenceOperationException
Deprecated. 

Search data store and return specified fields. The abstract mothed depend the subclass which extends it to access the database or LDAP ,the search is base on the filter,and the return fields base on the fields.

Parameters:
searchString - a search string used to conduct the search. For example. for database, it is a sql, for LDAP it is a filter string
fields - fileds should be returned
Returns:
Object holding search result
Throws:
PersistenceOperationException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is Null or any element in fields parameter is null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is any paramter is empty or any element in the fields parameter is empty
PersistenceOperationException - if any error when operating over data store
